answers.answer: Your blood pressure might be high
Try to stay hydrated and maybe you need a little caffeine!

I understand u cause I'm on the same page expect I'm 27 week's nd 3 day's nd i have a history of migraines so the doctor gave me some pills for my headache nd this has been my 2nd Day talking them I feel much better but before the doctor gave me the medicine he did blood nd urine just to make sure I wasn't having preeclampsia My blood pressure has always been stabled but just tell ur doctor nd see what he say's good luck nd i hope u feel better soon momma

Thanks. My blood pressure has always been fine every time i go in. They said it was fine last week. I am prone to migraines often. So bad it makes me sick. I asked my doctors and they said that alot of pregnant women get headaches. I only drink water and about one sprite every couple days.

question: I have severe headaches constantly that seem to never go away. And im almost 18 weeks. Is that normal? What does it mean.
title: severe headache
